OMESurvey

ðŸ“¦ The OMESurvey package contains tools for analysing survey data for the OME, in particular (for now) converting raw survey data into publishable excel workbooks.

Installation

You can install the development version of OMESurvey from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Jake-Powell/OMESurvey")

Examples

Creating survey results for a given theme

library(OMESurvey)
data = OMESurvey::survey_example

OMESurvey::plot_theme(data, theme = 'Theme_1', kind = 'ggplot')
